Overwhelming Radiance.name: Overwhelming Radiance
Overwhelming Radiance.fullText:
Astral Ascendant Attack 11Overwhelming Radiance

You blast your foe with searing radiant energy, leaving it temporarily open to your allies’ attacks.

Encounter        Arcane, Implement, Radiant
Standard Action      Ranged 10

Target: One creature

Attack: Constitution vs. Fortitude

Hit: 3d10 + Constitution modifier radiant damage, and the target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.


Published in Dragon Magazine 383, page(s) 43.
Overwhelming Radiance.flavor: You blast your foe with searing radiant energy, leaving it temporarily open to your allies’ attacks.
Overwhelming Radiance.onHit: 3d10 + Constitution modifier radiant damage, and the target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

Vestige of the Ascendant Commander.name: Vestige of the Ascendant Commander
Vestige of the Ascendant Commander.fullText:
Astral Ascendant Attack 20Vestige of the Ascendant Commander

You strike down your enemies with the wrath of the Ascendant Commander, leaving them reeling as your radiance burns into them.

Daily        Arcane, Healing, Implement, Radiant
Standard Action      Area burst 1 within 10 squares

Attack: Constitution vs. Reflex

Target: Each enemy in the burst

Hit: 3d8 + Constitution modifier radiant damage, and you daze the target (save ends).

Miss: Half damage.

Effect: If you hit at least one target, each ally in the burst can spend a healing surge. If you miss all targets, one ally in the burst can spend a healing surge.

Vestige Pact: You gain access to the vestige of the Ascendant Commander.

  Ascendant Commander Pact Boon: You gain a +2 power bonus to AC until the end of your next turn. If you are bloodied, increase the bonus to +4.

  Eyes of the Vestige Augment: Until the end of your next turn, allies’ attacks against the target deal 5 extra radiant damage.


Published in Dragon Magazine 383, page(s) 43.
Vestige of the Ascendant Commander.flavor: You strike down your enemies with the wrath of the Ascendant Commander, leaving them reeling as your radiance burns into them.
Vestige of the Ascendant Commander.onHit: 3d8 + Constitution modifier radiant damage, and you daze the target (save ends).
Vestige of the Ascendant Commander.effect: If you hit at least one target, each ally in the burst can spend a healing surge. If you miss all targets, one ally in the burst can spend a healing surge.
Vestige of the Ascendant Commander.vestigePact: You gain access to the vestige of the Ascendant Commander.
Vestige of the Ascendant Commander.ascendantCommanderPactBoon: You gain a +2 power bonus to AC until the end of your next turn. If you are bloodied, increase the bonus to +4.
Vestige of the Ascendant Commander.eyesOfTheVestigeAugment: Until the end of your next turn, allies’ attacks against the target deal 5 extra radiant damage.

Angelic Aura.name: Angelic Aura
Angelic Aura.fullText:
Astral Ascendant Utility 12Angelic Aura

Radiant energy surrounds you, lifting you into the air and mending your allies’ wounds.

Daily        Arcane, Healing
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain a fly speed of 6 and can hover. Any bloodied ally that starts its turn within 5 squares of you regains hit points equal to your Intelligence modifier.


Published in Dragon Magazine 383, page(s) 43.
Angelic Aura.flavor: Radiant energy surrounds you, lifting you into the air and mending your allies’ wounds.
Angelic Aura.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain a fly speed of 6 and can hover. Any bloodied ally that starts its turn within 5 squares of you regains hit points equal to your Intelligence modifier.
